reviews.review: hey everyone pizzaswag470 here again with another anteneh review on the counter strike series. im a big fan of the game since counter strike source (i played when it came out) and this game sucks. i hate this game so much because of everyone in voice chat calling me racial slurs. i cannot take it anymore, why dont you people just fucking monitor the voice chat system, im gonna lose my marbles if the next time i say to "go b" some guy says 15 different urban dictionary slurs to me. i just want to PLAY THE FUCKING GAME 4/10
Why are you even reading the reviews?

-u got russian guy in game
-another russian guy
-russian who speak english
-6 yo kid who slept with ur mother 10/10
Obrigado por dar um motivo a minha vida
Sehr Gut und spaßig aber nicht gut für Menschen
It is a very fun and addictive game that is great for playing with friends
из за того что бесплатная много читеров.

Dünyanın en güzel oyunu olabilir GTA Vice City'den sonra...

> playing mm
> see an enemy
> shoot him
> miss every shot
> he flicks around
> kills me in one shot
> exit cs:go

10/10

czesc super fajna gra mega naprawde

Топ игра, советую всем, незабываемое проведённое время.

Top , Spiel! , Prime lohnt sich , viel bessere Serversuche !

Читеров больше чем, остатков от сепера который подорвался на мине
You mean to tell me that all these skins I bought don't help my performance? 2 out of 5 stars. Needs wall running and kill streak helicopters.
jogo velho e quebrado, mas da para perder algumas horas de diversão!
Jogo incrível. Pena que as facas sejam tão caras.

This game used to be fun. Now it only has bad teammates. I have 1500 hours in this game and stuck in elo hell. I get queued with teammates who have the same amount of hours I have. But play like BOTs buying autosnipers every round. Bad comms or even no comms at all. Enemy however seem to get descent players with descent hours. If you are starting cs now. I suggest trying other games instead.

And yes. I wrote this after deranking to silver because of stupid russian teammates.
Bardzo polecam tą grę mimio, że jest dużo cheaterów ale jak się wyrobi ten tak zwany współczynnik to nie trafia się na cheaterów
esse jogo utiliza bastante saude mental isso ajuda na produçao de forsa do desenvolvimento do crebro
2015'ten bu yana anasını sikmişsiniz ben de sizin ananızı sikeyim.
Only casual is good, also prime isn't required. CSGO has a really good anti-cheat.
